narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Special People in Northeast, Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Community Health provider based in Philadelphia, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.3M in Medicaid payments across 67K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
